irtrusbot

Class IrcBot

  • Object
    • IrcBot

  • public class IrcBot
extends Object
    Class implementing the skeleton of controllable IRC bot or client with plugin support.
    Author:
    crash

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      IrcState laststate
      The previous state of the Bot/connection
      IrcPluginManager manager
      Plugin Manager object used for controlling plugins and dispatching event messages
      IrcSession session
      Session object used for controlling the IRC connection
      IrcState state
      The current state of the Bot/connection

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IrcBot()
      Constructs the object and sets any important instance information in contained objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPlugin(IrcPlugin plugin)
      Add and initialize a plugin for the bot Plugins added at this point will be enabled and will receive Event messages from the bot.
      void connect()
      Connects to the IRC server NOTE: updates the internal bot state to CONNECTED or DISCONNECTED depending on success.
      void disconnect()
      Disconnects from the IRC server.
      int loadPlugins()
      Requests that the Plugin Manager loads and adds all plugins found in the plugin directory
      void poll()
      Perform repetitive tasks for the bot such as sending/receiving commands and handling disconnections.
      void process_command(IrcCommand ic)
      Process a received IRC Command If the command can be determined to be a PRIVMSG [chat message], it is further processed by process_message() This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=RECEIVING) message to plugins The above additional processing can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
      void process_message(IrcMessage im)
      Processes an IRC PRIVMSG [chat message] command This function dispatches a CHAT (direction=RECEIVING) message to plugins Any additional processing can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages (NOTE: none implemented at this time)
      void quit()
      Disconnects from the IRC server NOTE: updates the internal bot state to QUIT always.
      void sendCommand(IrcCommand ic)
      Queue sending an IRC Command defined by an IrcCommand object This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
      void sendMessage(IrcMessage im)
      Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] defined by an IrcMessage object.
      void sendMessage(String to, String text)
      Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] to a specific destination This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins.
      void sendRaw(String line)
      Queue sending a raw IRC Command string to the server This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
      void sendReply(IrcMessage im, String text, boolean direct)
      Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] in reply to a received IrcMessage This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins.
      void start()
      Queue the BOT_START message to plugins to indicate beginning of operations.
      void stop()
      Dispatch the BOT_STOP message to plugins to indicate end of operations.
      void updateState(IrcState newstate)
      Updates the internal IrcState of the bot NOTE: this function also dispatches an Event message of type STATE to plugins with information about the previous and current state.

        Plugin Manager object used for controlling plugins and dispatching event messages

    • Constructor Detail

      • IrcBot

        public IrcBot()
        Constructs the object and sets any important instance information in contained objects.

    • Method Detail

      • addPlugin

        public void addPlugin(IrcPlugin plugin)
        Add and initialize a plugin for the bot Plugins added at this point will be enabled and will receive Event messages from the bot.
        Parameters:
        plugin - plugin class object to add.

      • loadPlugins

        public int loadPlugins()
                throws URISyntaxException
        Requests that the Plugin Manager loads and adds all plugins found in the plugin directory
        Returns:
        Number of plugins loaded
        Throws:
        URISyntaxException - An error occurred while building the plugin directory path.

      • updateState

        public void updateState(IrcState newstate)
                 throws Exception
        Updates the internal IrcState of the bot NOTE: this function also dispatches an Event message of type STATE to plugins with information about the previous and current state.
        Parameters:
        newstate - the new state to store for the bot.
        Throws:
        Exception - An error occurred while dispatching messages to plugins.

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws UnknownHostException,
                    Exception
        Connects to the IRC server NOTE: updates the internal bot state to CONNECTED or DISCONNECTED depending on success.
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - The server hostname provided [to the session connection details] could not be resolved.
        Exception - An error occurred while dispatching messages to plugins.

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
                throws IOException,
                       Exception
        Disconnects from the IRC server. NOTE: updates the internal bot state to DISCONNECTED always.
        Throws:
        IOException - A networking error occurred.
        Exception - An error occurred while dispatching messages to plugins.
        See Also:
        disconnect()

      • quit

        public void quit()
          throws IOException,
                 Exception
        Disconnects from the IRC server NOTE: updates the internal bot state to QUIT always. This state is used, as opposed to DISCONNECTED, to indicate a unrecoverable error or human-triggered disconnection, possibly to prevent reconnection.
        Throws:
        IOException - A networking error occurred.
        Exception - An error occurred while dispatching messages to plugins.
        See Also:
        disconnect()

      • start

        public void start()
        Queue the BOT_START message to plugins to indicate beginning of operations. No Event messages should be sent/received before this event This method should be used after: loading plugins, configuring - but before: connecting, ticking, quitting

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws Exception
        Dispatch the BOT_STOP message to plugins to indicate end of operations. No Event messages should be sent/received after this. NOTE: this message is sent synchronously. All plugin handling must finish before continuing. This method should be used before the bot instance is released.
        Throws:
        Exception - An error occurred while dispatching plugin messages.

      • sendReply

        public void sendReply(IrcMessage im,
                      String text,
                      boolean direct)
        Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] in reply to a received IrcMessage This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins. Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to either of these Event messages
        Parameters:
        im - The IrcMessage received that it is desired to respond to.
        text - The message to respond with.
        direct - Whether the message should be sent directly to the original sender (true), or can be sent to an intermediate channel (false)

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(String to,
                        String text)
        Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] to a specific destination This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins. Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to either of these Event messages
        Parameters:
        to - The destination, this can be a Nickname or a Channel name (must start with a hash symbol #)
        text - The message to send

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(IrcMessage im)
        Queue sending a PRIVMSG [chat message] defined by an IrcMessage object. This function also dispatches a CHAT and COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to either of these Event messages
        Parameters:
        im - The IrcMessage to send; this is formatted to "outgoing" syntax before transmitting.
        See Also:
        IrcMessage.toOutgoing()

      • sendCommand

        public void sendCommand(IrcCommand ic)
        Queue sending an IRC Command defined by an IrcCommand object This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
        Parameters:
        ic - The IrcCommand to send.

      • sendRaw

        public void sendRaw(String line)
        Queue sending a raw IRC Command string to the server This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=SENDING) message to plugins Sending can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
        Parameters:
        line - the raw IRC Command string to send

      • poll

        public void poll()
          throws Exception
        Perform repetitive tasks for the bot such as sending/receiving commands and handling disconnections. This function should be used in a loop until the bot state becomes QUIT Commands received are passed along to process_command() Multiple event messages may be dispatched depending on the level of processing a received command receives.
        Throws:
        IOException - A networking error occurred.
        Exception - An error occurred while sending messages to plugins.
        See Also:
        process_command(irtrusbot.IrcCommand)

      • process_command

        public void process_command(IrcCommand ic)
                     throws IrcMessageCommandException,
                            Exception
        Process a received IRC Command If the command can be determined to be a PRIVMSG [chat message], it is further processed by process_message() This function also dispatches a COMMAND (direction=RECEIVING) message to plugins The above additional processing can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages
        Parameters:
        ic - An object representing the IRC Command received.
        Throws:
        IrcMessageCommandException - A malformed PRIVMSG was received from the server.
        Exception - An error occurred while sending messages to plugins.
        See Also:
        process_message(irtrusbot.IrcMessage)

      • process_message

        public void process_message(IrcMessage im)
                     throws Exception
        Processes an IRC PRIVMSG [chat message] command This function dispatches a CHAT (direction=RECEIVING) message to plugins Any additional processing can canceled by a plugin returning the CANCEL_EVENT IrcEventAction in reply to these Event messages (NOTE: none implemented at this time)
        Parameters:
        im - An object representing the message to be processed.
        Throws:
        Exception - An error occurred while sending messages to plugins.
